root: ^Swing the last note of the Danse Macabre.

c-0: ^There is nothing to say goodbye to.
^Of all those I've given the power to, you are the first to choose the end of the world. And yet here you are weeping away.
^At least there will never be more who suffered as I did.
^There can be no suffering when there is no one to suffer.
^Titus, Penelope, Doctor Elethea. I'll join you in just a second!
c-1: ^It must be human nature to give up at the very last second that you can. Just like many before you have.
^My wish was always to die happily and simply as Ithma from the Kingdom outskirts. I don't want to take that away from others like me in this world.
^You won't be forgiven for your murders. There is no salvation for you.
^I know. But maybe there is for the others.
^(I'm sorry Titus, Penelope, but it seems that it will be a little longer before sis can be with you two.)
